answers.answer: Sounds like an STI, You should get it checked, some STI's lead to Testicular Cancer :/
I think you should go to a health clinic.  You probably need antibiotics.  Then you will probably be just fine but a little wiser.

question: Im 17 i have type 1 diabetes, and i had unprotected sex a week ago. This was my first time having sex. ever since then when i have tried to wank my penis has hurt and this white stuff has come up near the head and just below it. I am circumcised so im not sure what to do. i found a little sore in the middle below the head so does this mean i have an sti? or std??!!!
title: possible sti?
